description: Controls and utilities for Windows 8 XAML store applications.
releaseNotes:
* 1.0.0.0 Beta release *

      *****************************
      1.0.0.0. Month control with keyboard like layout.

      1.0.0.0. AppBar button with customizable popup menu.

      1.0.0.0. Count converter to count a property of elements in a nested collecton during binding.
      1.0.0.0. Tap effect.

      1.0.0.0. Date time converter for data binding.

      1.0.0.0. Concatenation converter to join a property of elements in a nested collecton during binding.

      
      * 1.1.0.0 First Release *

      *****************************
      1.1.0.0. Page header textblock with global navigation menu.

      1.1.0.0. Month control update - Move page up if month textbox is behind keyboard.

      1.1.0.0. AppBar button - Customzation option and more than six menu items. (incopatible with 1.0.0.0).
title: Windows Store Application Library
